track.name: Table Top Joe
comments: This song + Rum = My day isn't so bad anymore.
this guy always makes me smile
The Alice Demos bootleg version of this song is scary. [2]

I was happily singing/mumbling along to this for ages when I first got this album - then I got curious and thought I should have a look at the lyrics sheet and find out what-on-earth he was singing about....Oh-My-God - THAT'S what he means by 'Table Top Joe'!! .... I'm not sure I should be singing along so happily :S .... But then 'Joe' sounds happy enough...so what the hell :D
Ha ha! This always makes me smile. Tom waits imagination is amazing fuck knows what goes on in his head! Unless Taple toe joe is real, I wanna meet that mother fucker! I love Tom!
I dunno, I've gone off Tom Waits.   Waddya think?
ok, i like this one. Am I on my way to liking Waits....

I think, if this song wasn't on Alice... God forbid... I would have dismissed Waits as "not for me" when I first spinned Alice (my first album). Now I love the whole album, but back then, this little upbeat number pointed towards a much more accessible side of the man's work.
Tom Waits is like cracking your knuckles, one of those bad habits that you just can't drop.
Tom Waits should be on a stamp [2]
i agree with bennja, this is one of my favorite drinking songs
He just keeps on going doesn't he? What's it now almost 40 years bringing us thoughtful, funny everyday antical blues... God bless you mister waits.. you belong on a stamp
god damn you, tom waits. you're just too good.
